attributes.action: Work with Ofqual to recognise mental health impacts on Year 11&13 students 2021
attributes.additional_details: The effects of mental health are often brushed off by the government when these issues will be visible amongst this generation in the future. The new consultation by Ofqual ignores the effects of mental health as quarantine has increased the amount of students affected by it. If the government is able to work alongside Ofqual could really benefit students get fair examinations and get students the help they need for their mental health.
attributes.background: Understand that students are more vulnerable to mental health issues and consider this factor when forming exams for 2021 as negative mental health doesn't discriminate. With 4 months of self teaching, the stress amongst exam students are high which puts pupils at risk.

rejection.details:
We understand that you're concerned about the mental health of students, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a new petition asking the Government to provide funding for mental health services for this cohort of students, if that's something that you'd like to see. 

You may wish to sign some of these petitions about exam arrangements for 2021: 

Work with regulators and exam providers to clarify exam arrangements for 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/312570

Reduce curriculum content for year 10 & 12 students who will sit exams in 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/320772

Cancel GCSEs and A Levels in 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326066

Create a taskforce to establish a fair process for 2021 university candidates: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/548898 

Triple Lock for 2021 A Levels Exam Results: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/548555

Ensure all 2021 examinations are based on teacher assessment only: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549147

Do not delay A-level Exams: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549995

Open book exams for GCSE and A-level students sitting exams in 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/327397

If you are worried about your mental health or the mental health of someone you know, you can find advice and support here: 

Young Minds: https://youngminds.org.uk

Children’s Society: https://www.childrenssociety.org.uk/mental-health-advice-for-children-and-young-people/issues-affecting-young-people  

Childline: https://www.childline.org.uk/info-advice/your-feelings/anxiety-stress-panic/coping-with-stress/
